patient_info: Hematuria,Jaundice,Skin rash,Cirrhosis,Ascites,Hyperammonemia,Conjugated hyperbilirubinemia,Hypoalbuminemia,Elevated circulating alkaline phosphatase concentration,Elevated circulating creatine kinase concentration,Abdominal distention,Increased total bilirubin,Prolonged prothrombin time,Pedal edema,Decreased circulating ceruloplasmin concentration,Abnormal urinary color,Increased urinary porphobilinogen,Abnormality of hepatobiliary system physiology,Hypoactive bowel sounds,Elevated circulating aspartate aminotransferase concentration,Elevated circulating alanine aminotransferase concentration,Kayser-Fleischer ring
golden_diagnosis: 肝豆状核变性; 威尔逊氏病/Hepatolenticular degeneration; Wilson disease/Wilson disease/Wilson disease,肝豆状核变性; 威尔逊氏病/Hepatolenticular degeneration; Wilson disease/Wilson disease/Wilson disease,肝豆状核变性; 威尔逊氏病/Hepatolenticular degeneration; Wilson disease/Wilson disease/Wilson disease
predict_diagnosis:
1. Hepatocellular carcinoma with cholestasis and liver cirrhosis
2. Primary biliary cholangitis with associated skin rash and hyperammonemia
3. Porphryia cutanea tarda with jaundice and hematuria
4. Wilson's disease with cirrhosis, Kayser-Fleischer rings, and hypoalbuminemia
5. Autoimmune hepatitis with ascites and elevated liver enzymes
6. Inherited metabolic liver disease, such as alpha-1 antitrypsin deficiency, with cirrhosis and hyperammonemia
7. Drug-induced liver injury with abdominal distention and conjugated hyperbilirubinemia
8. Hepatitis B or C with prolonged prothrombin time and elevated alkaline phosphatase
9. Primary sclerosing cholangitis with abnormal hepatobiliary system physiology and elevated creatine kinase
10. Rotor syndrome with hyperbilirubinemia and hypoactive bowel sounds

Please note that the list is not exhaustive, and further clinical, laboratory, and imaging studies would be necessary to confirm a diagnosis.
